CustomField.formula:
CASE( Account_Credit_Status__c, '1 New Account',IMAGE("/resource/CreditCheck_1","New Account"), '2 Initial Check Submitted',IMAGE("/resource/CreditCheck_2","Initial Check Submitted"), '3 Initial Check Completed',IMAGE("/resource/CreditCheck_3","Initial Check Completed"), '4 Full Check Submitted',IMAGE("/resource/CreditCheck_4","Full Check Submitted"), IMAGE("/resource/CreditCheck_5","Full Check Completed")
)
CustomField.label: Credit Check Timeline
